Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class ServerLobbyBuilder

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.ServerLobbyBuilder
public class ServerLobbyBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents a single game lobby, to which players may join

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private boolean active
    The current status of the LobbyBuilder Thread
    private int currentLobbyPlayerCount
    The maximum number of players for the current lobby
    private Connection firstConnection
    The connection that arrived first and who has control of the player count for the lobby
    private java.util.LinkedList<Connection> lobbyRequestingConnections
    A LinkedList containing players who requested to be inserted in a lobby, in order of arrival
    private static java.util.logging.Logger LOGGER  
    private java.lang.Object playerCountLock
    The lock used to synchronize over currentLobbyPlayerCount
    private java.util.Map<Connection,​java.lang.String> registeredNicknames
    A Map containing all connections and the relative nicknames
    private Server server
    The reference to the server

    This method removes the nickname from the registeredNicknames structure

    This method accepts a playerCount and a connection and, if both are valid, sets the maximum player count This method also notifies all threads that are synchronized with playerCountLock
    (package private) void start()
    This method begins the main ServerLobbyBuilder thread, waiting for lobby requests and handling them in order to generate a Match.

  • Method Details

    • registerNickname

      public boolean registerNickname​(java.lang.String nickname, Connection connection)
      This method accepts a nickname and a connection and, if both are valid, registers the nickname, along with the connection
      Parameters:
      nickname - a String representing the nickname of the user
      connection - the Connection from which the user is communicating
      Returns:
      true if the registering has been successful, false otherwise

    • removeNickname

      public void removeNickname​(java.lang.String nickname)
      This method removes the nickname from the registeredNicknames structure
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname that has to be removed

    • setLobbyMaxPlayerCount

      public boolean setLobbyMaxPlayerCount​(int playerCount, Connection connection)
      This method accepts a playerCount and a connection and, if both are valid, sets the maximum player count This method also notifies all threads that are synchronized with playerCountLock
      Parameters:
      playerCount - an int representing the maximum number of players to allow in the lobby
      connection - the Connection from which the user is communicating
      Returns:
      true if the count has been set correctly, false otherwise

    • getCurrentLobbyPlayerCount

      public int getCurrentLobbyPlayerCount()
      This method retrieves the maximum number of players allowed in the lobby. If the player count has not been set, it returns 0
      Returns:
      the maximum number of players allowed in the lobby

    • handleLobbyRequest

      public boolean handleLobbyRequest​(java.lang.String nickname, Connection connection)
      This method handles a request to join the lobby by a player. If nickname and connection are both valid, the method adds the user to the queue, notifies all waiting threads and sends an OK on the connection
      Parameters:
      nickname - a String representing the nickname of the user is communicating
      connection - the Connection from which the user is

    • handleDisconnection

      public boolean handleDisconnection​(Connection connection)
      This method handles a disconnection in the setup phase.
      Parameters:
      connection - the disconnecting connection
      Returns:
      true if there were no errors

    • start

      void start()
      This method begins the main ServerLobbyBuilder thread, waiting for lobby requests and handling them in order to generate a Match.

    • getParticipantsList

      private java.util.List<java.util.AbstractMap.SimpleEntry<Connection,​java.lang.String>> getParticipantsList()

    • waitForParticipants

      private void waitForParticipants()

    • waitForCurrentLobbyPlayerCount

      private void waitForCurrentLobbyPlayerCount()

    • waitForFirstConnection

      private void waitForFirstConnection()

    • stop

      public void stop()
      This method stops the main ServerLobbyBuilder thread
